programme.title: Independent Lens
programme.desc: Go inside The Storm Lake Times, a family-run newspaper serving an Iowa town that has seen its share of changes. Pulitzer Prize-winning editor Art Cullen and his team are dedicated to keeping the paper alive as local journalism across the U.S. dies.

programme.title: Native America
programme.desc: Explore the rise of great American nations, from monarchies to democracies. Investigate lost cities in Mexico, a temple in Peru, a potlatch ceremony in the Pacific Northwest and a tapestry of shell beads in upstate New York.

programme.title: Elinor Wonders Why
programme.desc: Elinor becomes fascinated by the Velcro on Ari's new watch and observes that Velcro is very similar to a burr seed that is stuck to Ari's shirt. This leads them to discover that the invention of Velcro was based off the burr seed.
